actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to recognize, confirm, establish, vest and assign all right, title, and jurisdiction and authority of the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico relating to the lands beneath the navigable waters within the boundaries of the Commonwealth, and the natural resources within such lands and waters.

summary.text: Recognizes and vests in the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico all right, title, and interest in and to, and jurisdiction and authority over, the lands beneath the navigable waters within the boundaries of the Commonwealth, and the natural resources underlying such lands and waters.

titles.title: A bill to recognize, confirm, establish, vest and assign all right, title, and jurisdiction and authority of the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico relating to the lands beneath the navigable waters within the boundaries of the Commonwealth, and the natural resources within such lands and waters.
